info.game_comments:
2001 Teen Tournament quarterfinal game 5.
From the Pennsylvania Convention Center in Philadelphia.

(1, 1).clue: In early 2001 L.A. got 14" of rain; this city got 5" of rain & a 6.8 jolt that trapped people in its Space Needle

(2, 1).clue: Alyson Hannigan, seen here, is one of the stars of this "killer" show

(3, 1).clue: Read N' Play Tommy Pickles is one of the toys based on this TV series

(4, 1).clue: Ask a friend to set you up with one of his acquaintances for this kind of date; a seeing-eye dog is not required

(6, 1).clue: This character has dealt with a "Goblet of Fire", but let's see how he handles his film's producers

(1, 2).clue: In December 2000 this country felt several small quakes around Popocatepetl

(5, 2).clue: In some classes, time goes as slowly as this sweet liquid "in January"

(2, 4).clue: Get over yourself & name this group formed on "Popstars"
